ygData.subject: RE: Barbed Leather Whip Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I, personally, wouldn t pay more than 100pp for one - ideally between 60 - 80pp.  I have, on occasion, been able to sell them for as high as 150pp - but
ygData.messageBody:
> Questions:
>
> 1) How much should I auction for it and where? (I know it
> comes out of Najena)

I, personally, wouldn't pay more than 100pp for one - ideally between 60 -
80pp. I have, on occasion, been able to sell them for as high as 150pp -
but they're definitely not worth that much.

> 2) Is it better bang for the buck than a combine ls or scim?

If you can get one for under 80pp then it is a better deal. If people are
only selling them for 100+, but I would, personally, just pass on it.
Combine Scim is a pretty decent weapon all things considered... you should
be able to get one of those for 40-50pp.

> 3) Do I have a chance at skipping it and camping for a PGT before 20?

Not sure about this... never camped or even owned a PGT. Again, it all
depends on what you purchase the BLW for. If it's too high, I might try for
the PGT.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
>
> Thanks!
>
> Operaman
>
> Meandering Maestro of the 15th Song
>
> Innoruuk
